docs.text: rick_mailer - SMTP Client rick_mailer is a standalone version of Django's email client implementation, with minor changes. Usage License As rick_mailer is mostly Django code, it is licensed under Django license and copyright - see the included License file . Documentation Project documentation can be found on the Documentation website.
